languages.text: {n}Его рука лениво скользит по предмету, отложенному в сторону. В неверном свете вы с трудом узнаете агонатор, покрытый кровью.{/n}
{n}His hand lazily strokes an object lying beside him. In the faint light, you can just barely make out the agoniser, coated with blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Его рука лениво скользит по предмету, отложенному в сторону. В неверном свете вы с трудом узнаете агонатор, покрытый кровью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}His hand lazily strokes an object lying beside him. In the faint light, you can just barely make out the agoniser, coated with blood.{/n}

{n}His hand lazily strokes an object lying beside him. In the faint light, you can just barely make out the agoniser, coated with blood.{/n}
{n}His hand lazily strokes an object lying beside him. In the faint light, you can just barely make out the agoniser, coated with blood.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他的手懒洋洋地抚摸着身边的物品。在微弱的光线下，你勉强辨认出了那条沾满了鲜血的折磨之鞭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His hand lazily strokes an object lying beside him. In the faint light, you can just barely make out the agoniser, coated with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他的手懒洋洋地抚摸着身边的物品。在微弱的光线下，你勉强辨认出了那条沾满了鲜血的折磨之鞭。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、すぐそばにある物体を手でゆっくりと撫でる。かすかな光の中で、血まみれのアゴナイザーがかろうじて確認できた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His hand lazily strokes an object lying beside him. In the faint light, you can just barely make out the agoniser, coated with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、すぐそばにある物体を手でゆっくりと撫でる。かすかな光の中で、血まみれのアゴナイザーがかろうじて確認できた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Su mano acaricia lentamente el objeto que tiene al lado. Bajo la tenue luz, reconoces el agonizador cubierto de sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His hand lazily strokes an object lying beside him. In the faint light, you can just barely make out the agoniser, coated with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su mano acaricia lentamente el objeto que tiene al lado. Bajo la tenue luz, reconoces el agonizador cubierto de sangre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sa main caresse lascivement un objet posé à côté de lui. Dans la pénombre, vous parvenez tout juste à distinguer les contours du neurocide maculé de sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His hand lazily strokes an object lying beside him. In the faint light, you can just barely make out the agoniser, coated with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sa main caresse lascivement un objet posé à côté de lui. Dans la pénombre, vous parvenez tout juste à distinguer les contours du neurocide maculé de sang.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Träge streicht er mit seiner Hand über ein Objekt, das neben ihm liegt. Mit Mühe erkennst du im blassen Licht den blutverschmierten Peiniger.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His hand lazily strokes an object lying beside him. In the faint light, you can just barely make out the agoniser, coated with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Träge streicht er mit seiner Hand über ein Objekt, das neben ihm liegt. Mit Mühe erkennst du im blassen Licht den blutverschmierten Peiniger.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eli, yanında uzanan bir nesneye miskince vuruyor. Kısık ışıkta üstü kanla kaplanmış kıvrandıranı zar zor seçebiliyorsun.{/n}
